p: TgCRND8 mice were maintained in-house by breeding APP transgenic males (carrying WT RD gene [ 21] with C57B6/C3H F1 females (Envigo). These mice have florid AD-type Aβ plaque pathology in their forebrains, starting around 3 months of age. Animal procedures were approved by the University of Florida Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee. All animals were house grouped, under standard laboratory conditions (12:12-h light/dark cycle, lights on at 0600 h) with a room temperature of 21 °C, and water and food available ad libitum.
